ygData.subject: Re: Bard Quests
ygData.msgSnippet: All Wizard and Shaman see Invisible. Solusek Goblin (Mage, Priest, Goblin and Champion) all see invisible too. Another area where you can get the items is in
ygData.messageBody:
All Wizard and Shaman see Invisible.

Solusek Goblin (Mage, Priest, Goblin and Champion) all see invisible too.

Another area where you can get the items is in the general area of the High Shaman room( No idea
how to explain how to get there). It is where i got my boots and Vambraces. Good area if your
group is too small for the King area.


> From: "Reece, Tom - 25IDL G4" <g4mntofcr@...>
>
> Can you safely get to the area where the Solusek Mage and Champion spawn by
> singing the Invis song or are there mobs along the path that can See Invis?
>
> Galtin of E'cu
>
> > The Solusek Mage and champions show up in the area around the
> > king room. After you zone into Sol A, pass the lava and go
> > through the hole in the wall, you'll come to a T intersection
> > at the ledge. If you go straight (off the ledge) there's a
> > doorway. Go through that door and follow the right
> > wall. There's one passage that will loop back (ends at a
> > window above a previous area), but if you skip it and keep
> > following the right wall, it'll take you straight to the room
> > with the Solusek Mage. The room immediately prior to this,
> > there's a door on the left which leads to the king room. So
> > it's actually not that bad a place to use as a base and pull
> > to.

--
Benoit St-Hilaire
bsthilai@...

"...and, carefully following my own infallible formula, I completed the experiment that should
have resulted in gold. Such was not the case, however. I am therefore forced to conclude that the
materials purchased from you three days before Michaelmas last were defective and of inferior
grade."
-- an unknown alchemist
